h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
content: The equipped effect is a double-edged sword, however. It boosts your Defense but at the cost of your Attack. This could be worth it for you, depending on your  style and how boosted your Attack is via the Skill Tree and your equipped weapon.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The equipped effect is a double-edged sword, however. It boosts your Defense but at the cost of your Attack. This could be worth it for you, depending on your  style and how boosted your Attack is via the Skill Tree and your equipped weapon.
